examples.description: puts out the question 'What is the spell that enacts levitation?' until a user types 'Wingardium Leviosa'. Then, it puts out 'You passed the quiz!'
examples.full_description: #levitation_quiz puts out the question 'What is the spell that enacts levitation?' until a user types 'Wingardium Leviosa'. Then, it puts out 'You passed the quiz!'
